channel.title: NPC drops aren't working
channel.description:
This is what I have for drops.I have 110 for Fire giant,And yes They are spawned,I killed about 3 of them and no drops.This is whats in my NPCDROPS.CFG [code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount- -110 100% 4151 1
[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST]
[/code] Can someone tell me what I did wrong? I get no compile errors

item.title: NPC drops aren't working
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

also if you want you can change “giants” to any name i just put that in ebcause you said fire giants

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops aren't working
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

you could make some random drops… open up item2.java and add this [code]public static int Giants[] = {item id, item id,};

    public static int randomGiants()
    {
        return Giants[(int)(Math.random()*Giants.length)];
    }[/code]

then add this into npchandler.java

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomGiants(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

Read full topic

item.description:
@kupo wrote:

sometimes drops won’t load up from the cfg, check npc.java or something like npc.java… and look for an existing drop
